description.title: Explore Europe with Barclays
description.subtitle: Discover the rich history, diverse cultures, and stunning landscapes of Europe.
description.text: From the romantic streets of Paris to the ancient ruins of Rome, we'll help you navigate Europe with confidence. Enjoy secure payments with your Barclays card, competitive exchange rates for the Euro, and comprehensive travel insurance across the EU.

TravelInsuranceRecommendations.personalized_message: Since John, you already have a comprehensive travel policy, we recommend the following Barclays options to add greater flexibility and peace of mind:

recommendations.description: Expand and strengthen your current insurance with targeted travel benefits to cover more of the unexpected.

features.description: Increased limits for emergency treatments, providing added support during extended stays or unforeseen health needs.
Protects against loss or damage to electronics, jewelry, or other valuable items.
Supports unforeseen changes like policy shifts or transport strikes.

recommendations.description: Designed for frequent international travelers, offering protection and assistance wherever you go.

features.description: Covers neighboring countries outside of the Schengen area, ideal for last-minute trips.
Access to multilingual services for health and emergency coordination.

recommendations.description: Stay protected from unexpected situations with financial and identity support when needed.

features.description: Covers unauthorized charges for added security while abroad.
Swift help with replacing lost passports or visas.

recommendations.description: Ideal for spontaneous travel, offering flexible short-term coverage for one-off trips.

features.description: Only pay for the days you need coverage, providing a cost-effective choice for quick or last-minute trips.

recommendations.description: Easily access funds and loyalty points in case of an unexpected expense while traveling.

features.description: Redeem loyalty points for essential travel costs, such as extra hotel nights or new bookings.
Use funds from your vacation savings goal for emergencies, penalty-free.

ForexAndExchangeRecommendations.personalized_message: Since you may be traveling to multiple European destinations, we recommend the following Barclays services to ensure you get the best exchange rates and avoid unnecessary fees:

recommendations.description: A convenient way to get foreign currency before your trip or while abroad, with competitive exchange rates.

features.description: Avoid extra charges when purchasing foreign currency through Barclays.
Order foreign currency online in advance and pick it up at a branch or get it delivered to your home.
Receive the best exchange rates for a range of currencies to help you manage your spending abroad.

recommendations.description: A prepaid currency card that allows you to load multiple currencies onto one card, minimizing exchange rate fluctuations.

features.description: Pre-load your card with foreign currency at a fixed exchange rate, avoiding unexpected fluctuations.
Use the card for payments at millions of locations worldwide, wherever Visa is accepted.
Access local currency conveniently with fee-free withdrawals at Barclays ATMs abroad.

recommendations.description: Enjoy the benefits of zero foreign transaction fees and exclusive travel perks with your Barclays Platinum Credit Card.

features.description: Use your Barclays Platinum Credit Card abroad without worrying about additional foreign transaction fees.
Earn rewards on travel-related purchases to offset the cost of your next trip.
Access emergency funds through your credit card if you lose access to cash while traveling.

recommendations.product_name: Barclays Mobile Banking App for Currency Exchange
recommendations.description: Manage your foreign exchange needs directly through your phone, offering currency exchange and transfers at your fingertips.

features.description: Check live exchange rates and complete transactions on the go.
Transfer funds internationally with ease using Barclays' competitive rates directly through the app.

CreditCardAndTravelBenefitsRecommendatio.personalized_message: To maximize your travel experience and make the most of your spending while abroad, we recommend the following Barclays credit card options that offer exclusive travel benefits and enhanced rewards:

recommendations.description: Designed for frequent travelers, this card offers a range of travel-related perks, rewards, and protections.

features.description: Save on foreign transaction charges, making it ideal for purchases while traveling abroad.
Benefit from free travel insurance covering trip cancellations, medical emergencies, and lost baggage.
Enjoy complimentary access to a wide range of airport lounges globally for a more comfortable travel experience.
Earn extra reward points on travel-related expenses such as flights, accommodation, and transportation, which can be redeemed for travel rewards.

recommendations.description: With an emphasis on luxury and exclusive rewards, the Barclays Premier Rewards card is perfect for those who want to elevate their travel experiences.

features.description: Earn significant reward points for every travel-related purchase, which can be redeemed for flight tickets, hotel stays, and other travel benefits.
Enjoy comprehensive travel insurance including coverage for delays, cancellations, and emergency medical expenses.
Access to a dedicated concierge service for booking travel, dining, and entertainment experiences globally.
Access to luxury airport lounges worldwide for a comfortable and relaxing pre-flight experience.

recommendations.description: A great choice for those seeking high travel rewards and low fees for international purchases.

features.description: Earn rewards points on all purchases, especially on travel-related spending, which can be redeemed for travel vouchers or flights.
No extra charges on foreign transactions, ensuring that you get the best value when making purchases abroad.
Travel with peace of mind, knowing you're covered for medical emergencies, trip delays, and lost luggage.
Get access to special discounts on hotels, flights, car rentals, and other travel services.

recommendations.description: A well-rounded card for those who want to earn rewards while enjoying travel benefits.

features.feature_name: Earn Rewards on Travel & Everyday Purchases
features.description: Earn reward points not just on travel-related purchases, but on everyday spending, giving you more flexibility for redeeming rewards.
Receive coverage for accidents while traveling, ensuring extra protection during your trip.
Enjoy exclusive discounts on travel-related services, such as hotels, flights, and car hire.
